title: Kaia Gerber slips back into her casual crop top and jeans as she returns home to Malibu
text:
She has just returned from Europe where she walked for Milan Fashion Week in Italy before moving on to France for Paris Fashion Week.

And model Kaia Gerber looked considerably more low key when she was seen back home in Malibu, California on Wednesday.

The genetically blessed 18-year-old daughter of former supermodel Cindy Crawford, 53, and model-turned businessman Rande Gerber, 57, was spotted out in a white cropped top that she teamed with jeans and dark blue sneakers.

Caffeine hit: Kaia Gerber grabbed an iced coffee on a hot Wednesday in Malibu after returning from Fashion Weeks in Milan, Italy and Paris, France

The 18-year-old beauty pulled a New York baseball cap over her auburn tresses that skimmed her shoulders as she hit a Starbucks for a cold coffee on the hot day.

Kaia also stocked up at the Vitamin Barn and ran errands at CVS as she continued her shopping spree.

It's all a far cry from last weekend when Kaia looked chic in a black tuxedo jacket and little else.

Genetically blessed: The 18-year-old daughter of Cindy Crawford, 53, and model-turned businessman Rande Gerber, 57, was spotted out in a white cropped top,bjeans and sneakers

The teen, who accessorized with a black purse, was on her way to the Americans In Paris event.

According to the Council Of Fashion Designers Of America, the evening is 'the must-attend event of Paris Fashion Week.'

It 'provides buyers and editors with the opportunity to meet America's top emerging designers.'

High-end model: In Paris she graced the runway at the Chanel show on the rooftop of the Grand Palais in the Champs-Élysées on Tuesday

Only half dressed: Kaia looked chic in a black tuxedo jacket and, errrr, little else when she went to the Americans In Paris event

Before travelling to Europe, the in-demand model also walked the runways at New York Fashion Week for Max Mara, Proenza Schouler and Michael Kors.

In Italy, Kaia strutted her stuff for Versace and Moschino.

Meanwhile, In France she graced the runway at the Chanel show on the rooftop of the Grand Palais in the Champs-Élysées, among other designers.

Her mother Cindy, however, seems to be taking it easy this week as she was seen enjoying a morning sauna on Wednesday.
description: The model, 18, has just returned from Europe where she walked for Italy's Milan Fashion Week  before moving to France for Paris Fashion Week. She was seen home in Malibu on Wednesday..
